44.heading: Zero.
44.title: "I Guess if Folks has a Kind Heart, the Rest Don't Matter, Much"

notes: Summary: Zero gets a bath in preparation for meeting Aunt Martha, while Annie tells him her troubles.

45.heading: Zero.
45.title: "If Zero Dies It Will Be All My Fault!"
45.author: Darrell McClure.
notes: Summary: The matron has written to the dog-ketchers to take Zero away, and even though it's winter Annie is talking about running away.

46.heading: Zero.
46.title: "Look, Zero, 'The Cleanly Laundry.' Don't it Look Grand?"
46.author: Darrell McClure.
notes: Summary: The new laundry isn't as dangerous an investment as oil stock.
Strip undated except for copyright year; probably from Jan. 1934.

47.heading: Zero.
47.title: "We Just Gotta Get In Outa This Storm for a While"

notes: Summary: The dog catchers come for Zero, but Annie has run away from the orphanage into the storm.

48.heading: Zero.

notes: Summary: Aunt Martha wants to adopt Annie, and meanwhile Annie drew a picture of Zero in school.

53.heading: Zero.

54.heading: Zero.

55.heading: Zero.
